text: Rodrigo Riquelme Reche (born 2 April 2000) is a Spanish footballer who plays for English Championship club AFC Bournemouth, on loan from La Liga club Atlético Madrid, as a right winger. ==Club career== Born in Madrid, Riquelme joined Atlético Madrid's youth setup in 2010 at the age of ten, after representing Rayo Vallecano and Real Zaragoza. He made his debut with the reserves on 16 March 2019, playing the last five minutes of a 0–1 Segunda División B away loss against SD Ponferradina. Riquelme made his first team – and La Liga – debut on 1 September 2019, coming on as a late substitute for Thomas Lemar in a 3–2 home defeat of SD Eibar. On 1 October 2020, Riquelme joined English Championship club AFC Bournemouth on a season-long loan, with Bournemouth having the option to make the move permanent. ==Career statistics== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Europe !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="3" valign="center"|Atlético Madrid B |2018–19 |rowspan="2" valign="center"|Segunda División B |1||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||1||0 |- |2019–20 |21||5||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||21||5 |- !colspan="2"|Total !22!!5!!colspan="2"|—!!colspan="2"|—!!colspan="2"|—!!22!!5 |- |valign="center"|Atlético Madrid |2019–20 |valign="center"|La Liga |1||0||1||0||0||0||0||0||2||0 |- |valign="center"|Bournemouth (loan) |2020–21 |valign="center"|Championship |0||0||0||0||0||0||colspan=2|—||0||0 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !23!!5!!1!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!24!!5 |} ==References== ==External links== * * Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Madrid Category:Spanish footballers Category:Madrilenian footballers Category:Association football wingers Category:La Liga players Category:Segunda División B players Category:Atlético Madrid B players Category:AFC Bournemouth players Category:Atlético Madrid footballers
